name: SHUFFLE
description: HUPAYX is using blockchain technology to create an innovative economic model that connects digital assets and the real economy. Representative platforms include 'AssetFi', a real asset-linked decentralized financial decentralized investment platform, and 'Crypto Current Payment Gateway' (CCPG). "AssetFi" provides investors with distributed investment opportunities in a transparent manner to distribute profits safely, and "CCPG" is a platform that supports global cryptocurrency payments, providing more efficient and secure payment solutions for both businesses and individuals. The HUPAYX project is operating on the mainnet of Polygon, an Ethereum expansion solution, to quickly expand these ecosystems and be utilized in a variety of markets. SFL (Shuffle) is a key utility token that supports all services and transactions within the HUPAYX project ecosystem and plays an important role in expanding the ecosystem.
